properties.description: Open from 31-10-2022. Here to provide a community warm hub, all welcome. Catering for ALL. Daily papers, puzzles,magazines, a lounge area, a dining area, childrens play space, library all free to use.
properties.title: St Peter's Community Centre, Westfield

properties.address: Petters Way, South Street, Yeovil, Somerset BA20 1QF
properties.description: Open from 07-11-22. We can cater for young children as well as being accessible friendly We provide a separate quiet space for those who want to work or be undisturbed, and another social space for chatting, doing puzzles, board games or other activities people want to bring along. We provide free hot refreshments, biscuits, soup and bread
